replies.author: Aaron
replies.text: You are an idiot. And a blonde one at that. Figures.

replies.author: Alexandra
replies.text: Aaron did you write on everyone's page nasty things or just mine.. because I'm not that type of person.. but I guess you are.

replies.author: Aaron
replies.text: Just yours but every idiot in this pro Trump posting deserves the same. True American morons.
